name: Escape From Harold the Prequel
description:
The most awaited prequel to a game ever before released, this game was made in nearly 3h and features 5 sick levels.

R to Restart
W to walk forward
A to rotate left

The puzzles are meant to only rotate in one direction so if it looks weird it was intended to play that way.

None of the musics are mine as usual they are all from Monster Hunter and available on YouTube.
Enjoy.
